room_title: Escape room "Haunted Deadwood" by Out Of Time Escape in Charlotte
room_address: 16325 Northcross Drive, Suite B, Huntersville, NC 28078
room_description:
New Mexico 1880: The population of Deadwood mysteriously disappears and their souls are trapped inside the decaying buildings for eternity. In 1980 a young boy also mysteriously disappears while trying to solve the mystery of Deadwood.

Modern Day: Investigating the disappearance of the boy, you and your team of paranormal investigators enter the ghost town. Can you solve the mystery of the town and help the spirits of the townsfolk, or will you and your team be the next to disappear?
